com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory

Class CreditCardRequestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory.AbstractRequestFactory
      • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory.CreditCardRequestFactory

  • @Immutable
@LevelUpApi(contract=PUBLIC)
public final class CreditCardRequestFactory
extends AbstractRequestFactory
    AbstractRequest builder for requests to the Credit Cards endpoint.

    • Method Detail

      • buildCreateCardRequest

        @LevelUpApi(contract=PUBLIC)
@RequiresPermission(value="create_first_credit_card")
@AccessTokenRequired
public AbstractRequest buildCreateCardRequest(String cardNumber,
                                                                                                          String cvv,
                                                                                                          String expirationMonth,
                                                                                                          String expirationYear,
                                                                                                          String postalCode)
        Builds a request to the server which will add a credit card for the current user.
        Parameters:
        cardNumber - the card number for the card.
        cvv - the CVV (security code) of the card.
        expirationMonth - the month the card expires.
        expirationYear - the year the card expires.
        postalCode - the billing postal code of the card.
        Returns:
        AbstractRequest to create a card on the server.

      • buildGetCardsRequest

        @LevelUpApi(contract=ENTERPRISE)
@AccessTokenRequired
public AbstractRequest buildGetCardsRequest()
        Builds a request to get the credit cards for a user.
        Returns:
        AbstractRequest to use to get the credit cards for the current user.

      • buildPromoteCardRequest

        @LevelUpApi(contract=ENTERPRISE)
@AccessTokenRequired
public AbstractRequest buildPromoteCardRequest(CreditCard card)
        Builds a request to promote (set as default) a credit card.
        Parameters:
        card - the CreditCard to promote.
        Returns:
        AbstractRequest to use to promote a credit card.

      • buildDeleteCardRequest

        @LevelUpApi(contract=ENTERPRISE)
@AccessTokenRequired
public AbstractRequest buildDeleteCardRequest(CreditCard card)
        Builds a request to delete a credit card.
        Parameters:
        card - the CreditCard to delete.
        Returns:
        AbstractRequest to use to delete a credit card.
